translations: 书信电报（letter message）；数据处理（Language Translation）

sentences.sentence: He was replaced by Lt. Frank Fraser.
sentences.translation: 他由弗兰克•弗雷泽少尉来取代。

sentences.sentence: Flt Lt Beamont had completed a 200 hour tour of ops in December 1941.
